title: Drawing, "Design for a Teapot", October 1941
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite on cream tracing paper; verso: white and yellow pastel
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: 45 [smeared]
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower center: THEIERE (C)/DIAMETRE 12 cms/HAUTEUR 12 cms 75; lower right: JEAN PUIFORCAT/10-41.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Pear-shaped teapot with flared spout drawn in elevation with an applied scalloped-edged lower body indicated in yellow pastel to be executed in vermeil. Hinged lid surmounted by a short stem-form finial and attached C-scroll handle indicated in white pastel to be executed in ivory. Raised on a short flaring foot. Placement of screws and hinge indicated by circles on lid and upper handle. Underdrawing in graphite of teapot in golden section.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Teapot", October 1941.
October 1941. Pen and black ink, graphite on cream tracing paper; verso: white and yellow pastel. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-72.
